greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n is the k-th squarefree number then a(n) = k, otherwise a(n) = 0.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) first(n)=my(v=vector(n),k); forsquarefree(m=1,n, v[m[1]]=k++); v \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 08 2018
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 07 2004
